Class BigTwoGUI

java.lang.Object
BigTwoGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardGameUI
public class BigTwoGUI extends Object implements CardGameUI
The BigTwoGUI class implements the CardGameTable interface. It is used to build a GUI for the Big Two card game and handle all user actions.
Author:
DaveMatthew

  • Constructor Details

    • BigTwoGUI

      public BigTwoGUI(BigTwo game)
      a constructor for creating a BigTwoGUI. The parameter game is a reference to a card game associates with this GUI.
      Parameters:
      game - takes the BigTwo object as the argument to repaint GUI.
